attributes.title: Crusty dusty🤢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app firstly because I love trump so much and he’s done so much for our community but later to find out that the apps layout is disgusting. I can’t take it I can’t find ANYTHING. It also hacked my phone!! I should’ve read the reviews I heard that it did the same for some other people later on but god🙄

attributes.title: Gen zzz

Not only is he a terrible president but he is trying to take away an app where many kids grow up, spend time, and learn. It's different when you grow up in different generations because there are so many new things coming out all at once and it's hard to compare. As a part of gen-z we are powerful and can cancel anyone

attributes.title: Awful!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: Something weird happened when I downloaded the app!! My phone exploded 😱😱😱. How dare this app explode my phone without permission😡😡😡. Also when I saw trumps face I puked😱😱 how DARE this app make me PUKE without permission either🤬🤬.

attributes.title: truly awful app
attributes.review:
imagine this: you wake up on a beautiful thursday afternoon, the air is crisp and smells of freshly made waffles. you stretch, as you do before getting up, and then get dressed and eat. shortly after this you go to check your phone. as your fingers barely graze the surface of your screen you receive 3rd degree burns on the tips of your fingers. the trump 2020 app has been sending you notifications all night, causing your phone to malfunction and overheat. you struggle to find gloves, so you can unlock your phone and check the notifications that you assume must be urgent due to the sheer volume and quantity of messages. as you click on the trump 2020 app, it glitches. you try again. and again. you resort to restarting your phone and trying to open it again. when this finally works you start to read the first message. you think to yourself “wow! that’s crazy, where are the sources for this information?”. you attempt to scroll down. you scroll further. no trace of a source. you continue looking for so much as a wikipedia link. nothing is there. you google the information in the trump 2020 notifications to check if there is evidence to back the claims. there is no such thing, in fact, there is evidence to the contrary. this is stated by doctors and persons with multiple college degrees- not reality tv hosts and rappers who claim slavery was a choice. you check the next trump 2020 notifications and follow the same process. same results. pictures of people being incriminated that magically crop out trump circulate the media. but this must be related to the so called “fake news”. 
however, i do have a positive takeaway from this app: the thousands of people who attend trumps rallies corona virus tests. those are all positive.

attributes.title: APP DOESNT LET ME ORDER FOOD
my pet dinosaur is a chicken
attributes.review: i found out today that my pet dinosaur is a chicken i was very mad because pet chickens aren’t normal😡😡😡

attributes.title: app is not good, it runs very bad and makes phones crash
attributes.review: As soon as I download the app it began crashing and making my brand new iphone run very slow and the app was also causing my phone to lose battery at a considerably faster rate. I had a few of my friends get the app as well to see if it was maybe just my phone, but they had the same exact issue, all of our phones are less than a year old so it is not due it issues concerning the age of the phone. Overall I am extremely unimpressed and I do not recommend this app to anyone!

attributes.title: Why would some one get this
attributes.review: I was outside tommorow and it’s my sisters birthday is yesterday so my girlfriends boyfriend got her a present so tommorow when she opened it she was in shock cuz she got a dildo and then I saw this app and I downloaded it to be disappointed because I didn’t see a orange as expected
